bio:treatment.description: Culms 75-150 cm. Basal leaf sheaths with papillose-based hairs; cauline leaf blades 1-6 mm wide, flat. Panicle branches 10-25 cm. Spikelets 2-2.8 mm; lower lemmas pubescent.
bio:treatment.discussion: Digitaria filiformis var. villosa has essentially the same geographic range as var. filiformis and grows in similar habitats. Further study may show that the two varieties should be combined.
